name: PokerSamadhi
0:
”Alexa, open poker samadhi”
”Alexa, start poker samadhi”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: poker samadhi
des: Play your best life with Poker Samadhi. Get ready to be inspired by the best players in poker and in life with inspirational quotes. When using the poker samadhi skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
